subject: Re: [junit] Report "to implement" tests.
msgSnippet: Lars, Have you created a feature request at github to track our progress toward this goal? David
messageBody:
Lars,

Have you created a feature request at github to track our progress
toward this goal?

David

On Thu, Apr 14, 2011 at 3:26 PM, lars.vonk <lars.vonk@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I would like to see progress in (acceptance) tests not yet implemented. I want these reported differently than normal failures. Is there a way in JUnit to distinct between expected failing tests and "normal" failing tests?
>
> So in a report I would like to see something like:
>
> Tests: 42
> Failures:0
> Errors: 0
> Ignored: 0
> To implement: 12
>
> Regards, Lars
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
